name: Hector Ventura
title: Co-Founder
bio: Hi, I'm Hector Ventura, a systems engineer with more than 13 years of experience in architecture and application development. Co-founder of Alphnology and currently working with Consensus Cloud Solutins, a US based company that offers a variety of services such as Faxing, Electronic document signing, etc. I was a professor in Linux System Administration at Fundación Código Libre Dominicana (FCLD) during 2008-2010, and professor of programming at Instituto Tecnológico de las Américas (ITLA) during 2017-2020.
